channel.title: I need help makin a server
channel.description: i am using Project16_v.3 every time i click compile it says system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue can someone please help

item.source: I need help makin a server

item.title: I need help makin a server
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

you need jdk and a jre to run a server , use this if you have jre1.5.0_09 and jdk1.5.0_09

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pauseUse this if you have jre1.5.0_06 and jdk1.5.0_06

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pauseUse this if you have jdk1.5.0_07 and jre 1.5.0_07

thats what i have…

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAME Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause

~HOW TO FIND WHICH JAVA YOU HAVE~

  1. Goto start
  2. Got o run
  3. Paste this in the run: C:/program files/java
  4. Replace the jdk1.5.0_09 or jre1.5.0_09 with which jdk and jre you have

Now it should work, Tele

Read full topic
